sentences.sContent: Voters dislike opportunists – politicians who change their policies according to opinion polls.
sentences.sCn: 选民不喜欢机会主义分子——那些根据民意调查结果来改变方针的政客。

synos.tran: 机会主义者；投机取巧者

机会主义的；投机取巧的
